data.name: USSR CHAN: Hentai Puzzle Game Demo
data.detailed_description:
USSR Chan: Hentai Puzzle Game is a simple puzzle game, you only need to swap the pieces of images to restore the pictures. The game supports browsing pictures mode that will allow you to track your progress using one hand. You can unlock all pictures in just one minute or less.
There is no time or star limit in the game, you are supposed to enjoy the relaxing experience.

Features


Undressing by puzzles solving
The one hand opening gallery for exploring your successes
Cute soviet girl that you will interact with

data.short_description: Relaxing puzzle game to keep you in a good mood in true soviet/ussr environments

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 512 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Mouse

content_descriptors.notes:
Nudity or sexual content
Not suitable for watching at work
Not suitable for all ages
All characters in the game are over 18 years old
